channel.title: Server not launching/doing anything
channel.description: I followed the instruction in the toturial, downloaded everything, changed to my ip etc, when i run lserver and server, lserver pops up with a dos box and closes after a second, and server just spams attempting to connect to ls. How do i fix this?

item.title: Server not launching/doing anything
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

Try going to ant/bin/ then edit ‘ant.bat’, at the very bottom add a ‘pause’, then you should probably see the error.

Read full topic
